column1: Maximum number of linked products per source product (leave empty for unlimited)
column2: Maximum number of linked products per source product (leave empty for unlimited)

column1: Apply to products matching the following conditions (leave blank for all products)
column2: Apply to products matching the following conditions (leave blank for all products)

column1: Link to products matching the following conditions (leave blank for all products)
column2: Link to products matching the following conditions (leave blank for all products)

column1: Target product attribute will be compared to source product
column2: Target product attribute will be compared to source product

column1: Cron expression for rule processing. Default: 0 * * * * (hourly). Examples: */15 * * * * (every 15 minutes), 0 2 * * * (daily at 2am).
column2: Cron expression for rule processing. Default: 0 * * * * (hourly). Examples: */15 * * * * (every 15 minutes), 0 2 * * * (daily at 2am).
